description: The parameter logshipping_async_buffer_size controls logshipping buffer size.

queries.name: q_async_replication_mode
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM M_SYSTEM_REPLICATION WHERE REPLICATION_MODE = 'ASYNC'

queries.name: q_logshipping_async_buffer_size
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_INIFILE_CONTENTS WHERE FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' AND SECTION= 'system_replication' AND KEY = 'logshipping_async_buffer_size'

actions.description: During a full data shipment and if system replication is disconnected, it has to start from scratch. In order to reduce the risk of buffer full situations, parameter logshipping_async_buffer_size can be adjusted to 1GB on the primary site.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,1999880 - FAQ: SAP HANA System Replication, https://me.sap.com/notes/1999880
